participant_1.background:
I live in Manhattan with my wife and two kids.
I get to spend lots of time playing and laughing with my kids.
i have bowled a 300 game twice in my life.
until recently i have never been able to sing in front of anyone.
I often take my kids out to dinner to remind me of my childhood.

participant_2.background:
I loved reading books with my parents at the library during summer.
I love Christmas because I get to spend time with my family and eat lots of delicious food.
I'd brag about my famous Harry Potter knowledge to my friends.
i have 5 grandchildren.
Social media is not my thing.

content.text: I'm going to the library to read some books.
That sounds fun! I love reading books.
What do you like to read about?
I like to read different genres of books, but my favorite is fantasy.
Me too! I love the Harry Potter series.
I love Harry Potter too! It's my favorite book series.
What's your favorite book in the series?
I can't pick just one! They're all so good.
I know what you mean. I love them all too.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I love meeting new people who love to read.
Me too! It's always nice to talk to someone who shares your interests.
I agree. Maybe we can talk about books sometime again.
Great! I'll text you my number
